title: Webbrowser package supported on macOS?
question:
I’m trying to use Python’s 
webbrowser
 package to open a Web page at a particular point in my script, running on Rhino 7.9 on macOS 11.4:


import webbrowser
webbrowser.open("https://www.google.com/")



The code runs without an error, but the browser window doesn’t open. Is this operation not supported on macOS, or am I doing something wrong? Thank you!

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino
url = 'https://www.rhino3d.com/'
script = '_-Run {0}'.format(url)
Rhino.RhinoApp.RunScript(script, False)
code_blocks.author: dale
